go_abroad_and_immerse: Go abroad and immerse in a new language.
connect_with_host: Connect with our hosts, confirm your dates, and book your stay.
choose_as_many_as_you_want: Choose as many as you want
where: Pick a place to learn it
language_modal_title: Before we get started, we’d love to know a little about you. (You can only have a given language as learning or fluent but not both)
language_modal_title_hosts: We're excited to see that you want to become a host with us. Before we dive into the details of your home, we’d love to know a bit about you.
you_may_book_school: Choose your language learning adventure. Find your ideal host and immersion style.
stay_description: Live with locals to learn their language and culture.
tandem_description: Live with locals to learn their language and culture, while you save on the way by teaching them yours.
teacher_description: The the most effective way to improve a language. Live with a local language teacher, solving all your doubts at home. Choose weekly teaching hours and book.
stay_description_tooltip: Live with locals to learn their language and culture
tandem_description_tooltip: Live with locals to learn their language and culture, while saving on the way by teaching them yours
teacher_description_tooltip: Live with a local language teacher, solving all your language doubts at home
main_hero_subtitle: Immerse in a new language and culture.
discover_description: Choose between hundreds of cities and hosts across the globe. Find hosts with common interests to immerse in a new culture and language.
book_immersion_description: Pick a program: {{stay}}, {{tandem}} and {{teachers_stay}}. Connect with our hosts, confirm your dates, and book your stay.
book_language_course_description: Optionally, book a language course close to where you'll be living. Choose the level and hours per week. Travel to your new destination, learn, immerse, and enjoy.
validation_message: Please fill in all fields correctly.
password_validation_message: Password must be 8+ characters and have either an uppercase letter or a number.

password_validation_messages.MUST_HAVE_TWO_OF_THREE: Password must be 8+ characters and have either an uppercase letter or a numbers.

sign_up_conditions: By signing up, I agree to Abroadwith’s Terms and Conditions, Privacy Policy, Refund Policy, and Host Terms.
languages_choose_at_least_one: Please choose at least one known language.
signup_conflict: An account with these credentials already exists. Click here to log in.
confirmation_email_modal_content: We sent you a confirmation email. Please follow the link in the email to confirm your email address. You'll need to do this before you can take full advantage of our platform.
help_request_sent_explanation: Our staff have received your request and will respond via email as soon as possible.
click_to_validate_account: Click here to verify your account
please_verify_email_to_book: Please verify your email to book
please_verify_phone_to_book: Please verify your phone to book.
please_verify_email_and_phone_to_book: Please verify your phone and email to book.
email_verified_success_paragraph1: This is awesome news! Welcome to the Abroadwith platform. Give {{profile_link_open}}your profile{{profile_link_close}} some love and start searching for your ideal host. Or if you prefer, {{host_link_open}}become a host{{host_link_close}} and start offering your home to students from around the world.
email_verified_success_student: This is awesome news! Welcome to the Abroadwith platform. Give your profile some love and start searching for your ideal language immersion.
email_verified_success_host: This is awesome news! Welcome to the Abroadwith platform. Become a host and start offering your home to students from around the world.
verifications_modal_subtitle: Please verify your identity to use our platform
facebook_signup_email_error: Oops, it looks like Facebook is not providing us with a valid email for your account. Please try signing up with via email or Google.
we_sent_verification_sms: We sent a verification code via SMS (text message) to {{phoneNumber}}.
please_enter_sms_code_and_click: Please enter your verification code and click verify.
homestay_pricing_disclaimer: Final booking price depends on additional services, hourly packages, currency, and more.

incomplete_homestay_booking.title: You have an incomplete booking
incomplete_homestay_booking.description: We've saved the details for you, and you can head back and finish up whenever you'd like.

courses_page_coming_soon_description: In the very near future, Abroadwith will offer students the ability to book language courses in addition to, and completely separately from, their homestay experiences. This page will host an independent language-course search. Please check back soon.
verification_email_sent_modal_host: Please check your email and verify your address to become a host with Abroadwith.
verification_email_sent_modal_student: Please check your email and verify your address to take full advantage of the Abroadwith platform.
